description:
Remote Tools for Visual Studio 2022 enables app deployment, remote debugging, remote testing, performance profiling, and unit testing on computers that do not have Visual Studio installed.

## Notes

[Supported Operating Systems](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/visualstudio/releases/2022/system-requirements#supported-operating-systems): Windows 11 (x64 and arm64), Windows 10 (x64), Windows Server 2022 / 2019 / 2016 (x64)
summary: Enables app deployment, remote debugging, remote testing, performance profiling, and unit testing on computers that do not have Visual Studio installed.
author: Microsoft
